duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage Sales & New Business Development with Automotive OEMs on new and carry over programs.
Monitor customer programs, identify opportunities for new business, secure RFQs, make sales presentations and proposals, aimed at winning new business from Automotive OEMs.
Manage relationships with Automotive OEMs - sales of technical solutions into new and unique applications.
Identify opportunities for new business and expansion within Automotive OEMs.
Ensure outstanding customer service and satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business or Technical field (Master's preferred)
